Source.Name: hyprpaper
Source.Summary: A blazing fast wallpaper utility for Hyprland
Source.Description: Hyprpaper is a blazing fast wallpaper utility for Hyprland with the ability to dynamically change wallpapers through sockets. It will work on all wlroots-based compositors, though.
